rows.label: qst701302_msg0001
rows.name:
There you are.
I've been looking for you everywhere.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, you're that traveling performer's
friend, aren't you?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0003
rows.name: Hm? Is something wrong?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm sorry to approach uninvited, but
this is urgent, I just couldn't wait...

rows.label: qst701302_msg0005
rows.name:
Don't worry about it, we always have
time to hear a person out. What's got
you so flustered?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0006
rows.name: ...Thank you.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0007
rows.name:
It's Leon, he's gone missing.
He must've gone searching for
the Rainbow Blossom.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0008
rows.name: Rainbow-what now?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0009
rows.name: It's, ah...

rows.label: qst701302_msg0010
rows.name:
Ohh, I really thought it'd be enough
to make him give this whole thing up.
I never thought he'd actually go and...

rows.label: qst701302_msg0011
rows.name:
That's your mistake right there.
He's the type who only gets more
fired up by obstacles.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0012
rows.name: You could've told me that sooner!

rows.label: qst701302_msg0013
rows.name:
I'm not really an expert, but is love
really a thing that needs to be proven?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0014
rows.name:
I just don't understand how someone
can believe in something so blindly. All
this talk of love and destiny he spouts...

rows.label: qst701302_msg0015
rows.name:
He may be impulsive and hot-headed,
but he's not a liar. Just an idiot, like
he clearly demonstrated back there.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0016
rows.name: That's not what I mean...

rows.label: qst701302_msg0017
rows.name:
You don't trust him.
And you're afraid to open up to him
because you're not sure.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0018
rows.name: Is that so wrong...?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0019
rows.name: I didn't say that.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0020
rows.name:
I just thought that maybe your real
reason lay elsewhere.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0021
rows.name:
Anyway, this Rainbow Blossom...
Are you sure it's really extinct?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0022
rows.name:
I...couldn't say for sure... But...
I've heard that here in Iira, it may've
survived in a secret area somewhere...

rows.label: qst701302_msg0023
rows.name:
You used to see it all over, before, but
then with overexploitation and changes 
in the climate, its numbers dwindled...

rows.label: qst701302_msg0024
rows.name:
Is that so? Then I imagine he would
also try to seek out this secret area
you speak of.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0025
rows.name:
He fancies himself an adventurer,
does he now?

rows.label: qst701302_msg0026
rows.name:
I'm sorry you had to get involved in
our stupid business...

rows.label: qst701302_msg0027
rows.name:
You know I didn't mean for anything
bad to happen, I just...

rows.label: qst701302_msg0028
rows.name:
It's OK, we understand. For starters,
we'll go search for clues.

rows.label: qst701302_msg0029
rows.name:
There's absolutely no need for you to
blame yourself.
